channel.title: [PI] organized .java files in java folder and .class in a classfolder cant run?
channel.description: [code]Error: Could not find or load main class Jframe Press any key to continue . . . [/code] i know i have to edit run to search for Jframe in the class folder i made for all class files, how exactly do i do that? [code]@echo off title Project ******** java -Xmx300m Jframe 10 0 highmem members 32 pause[/code]

item.title: [PI] organized .java files in java folder and .class in a classfolder cant run?
item.dc:creator: @bowzer bowzer
item.description:
@bowzer wrote:

what it says when i change Gui to JframeException in thread "main" java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: sign/signlink at client.main(client.java:2772) Caused by: java.lang.ClassNotFoundException: sign.signlink at java.net.URLClassLoader$1.run(Unknown Source) at java.net.URLClassLoader$1.run(Unknown Source) at java.security.AccessController.doPrivileged(Native Method) at java.net.URLClassLoader.findClass(Unknown Source) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) at sun.misc.Launcher$AppClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) ... 1 more Press any key to continue . . .

Read full topic

Change Gui to JFrame.

item.title: [PI] organized .java files in java folder and .class in a classfolder cant run?
item.dc:creator: @ExtremeX-Scape Ryley
item.description:
@ExtremeX-Scape wrote:

java -classpath ./class/ -Xmx512m Gui 30 0 lowmem members 32 pause

item.source: [PI] organized .java files in java folder and .class in a classfolder cant run?

item.title: [PI] organized .java files in java folder and .class in a classfolder cant run?
item.dc:creator: @iBunnie iBunnie
item.description:
@iBunnie wrote:

[quote=“bowzer, post:1, topic:469028”]Error: Could not find or load main class Jframe Press any key to continue . . .
i know i have to edit run to search for Jframe in the class folder i made for all class files, how exactly do i do that?

@echo off title Project ******** java -Xmx300m Jframe 10 0 highmem members 32 pause[/quote]

@echo off
Title Client
cd ./Class/
START java -Xmx512m Gui 30 0 lowmem members 32
exit
